title: So now we can see how many times we have been upvoted
body:
And now the front page is filled with MEME gif boards.  

Is this IMGUR?

replies.body:
I feel like I'm in /r/funny

The thing is, nothing in /r/funny is actually funny. So that isn't a good thing.

> [{quoted}](name=test account,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=QB90kePs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-06T04:51:45.549+0000)
>
> I feel like I'm in /r/funny
> 
> The thing is, nothing in /r/funny is actually funny. So that isn't a good thing.

\>implyign
Yea, would be nice if theyÂ´d implement the possibility to exclude individual sepcific boards from the home-board.

Honestly like 80% of the stuff they post isn't even funny or interesting in the slightest.

There are some good ones like this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/o1kqjbYF-when-you-are-about-to-be-killed-but-thresh-saves-you-at-the-last-second

But then there is a whole lot of garbage like this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/AHEwtJd0-when-the-enemy-is-using-the-same-champion-as-you-but-you-have-the-better-skin

And honestly it's kind of obnoxious seeing crap like that second one get tons of upvotes and make it to the front page. I honestly think the only reason that even happened is because Laughing Fish posted it, and the community seems to have idolized him recently as "the funny gif guy" and so now everything he posts is automatically considered quality.

Can we just, like, ban Laughing Fish for spamming?

Alternatively, give Memes and Games the GD treatment - no front page content.

It was okay for 2 days but enough is enough man.

> [{quoted}](name=Flarefox,realm=OCE,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=QB90kePs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-06T14:52:51.833+0000)
>
> Can we just, like, ban Laughing Fish for spamming?
> 
> Alternatively, give Memes and Games the GD treatment - no front page content.
> 
> It was okay for 2 days but enough is enough man.

Agreed, but  he/she's not the only one to flood Boards, so get rid of all of them to be fair and not blatantly target.

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=QB90kePs,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-06T17:48:51.129+0000)
>
> That's harassment :X

http://legal-dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/harassment The internet is a powerfull tool of knowledge too.

I'm gonna downvote you for not following GIF Master Race.

http://new4.fjcdn.com/thumbnails/comments/Kneel+before+the+greatest+morrowind+gif+_2dbbfb4a1e30334ff9185e2f707a080b.gif

nothing wrong with gifs and pics and such... but like many others i wish there were controls so that if we did not want to see them we did not want to... 4 months ago was the last riot said they were working on it that i know of, besides it "being on the radar"

there seems to be a serious lack of interest by riot in it's own board.... that it forced on the community
It's not that we're becoming Imgur, it's just that everybody wants to be Laughing Fish.
The frontpage has always been filled with memes -__-

http://media.giphy.com/media/LiRoVoHjMa5bO/giphy.gif

jk, i just started cause i posted one monty python joke and people really seemed to like it so i just continued on and now this has happened
